# ssidPrefix

**Instance Property**

The prefix string of SSID of the accessory’s Wi-Fi network.

## Declaration

```swift
var ssidPrefix: String? { get set }
```

## Specifying Wi-Fi properties

- **ssid**: The SSID of the accessory’s Wi-Fi network.
